text: Ricardo Mário de Souza (born 21 September 1994) is a Brazilian track and field sprinter who competes in the 100 metres. He represented the host nation at the 2016 Rio Olympics. He holds a personal best of 10.21 seconds for the 100 m. He emerged in 2013 with three medals at the 2013 South American Junior Championships in Athletics.RESULTADOS 20.10.2013. CONSUDATLE. Retrieved on 2013-10-26.
